description:
JavaScript is the most happening language for the web. JavaScript is now a must learn language for any web developer. Innovation such as trace trees have greatly improved JavaScript's performance and it is gaining popularity among all developers.

jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library. It makes things like HTML document traversal and manipulation, event handling, animation, and Ajax much simpler with an easy-to-use API that works across a multitude of browsers.

We bring together a course which will teach you these two amazing technologies quickly to get you started in web development.
title: Learn Javascript & JQuery From Scratch
